comment: The class in general is tough, but she was the best teacher I could've asked for. She is so passionate about math and you can tell that when she is teaching. There are handout for the notes that help you learn and study. Class is mandatory, in-class learning assignments almost every class but they help you ALOT. Especially for the tests. Take her!!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: I took Business Calc since it was part of my major's requirement. I have never been 'great' at math, but Professor Sink makes learning math fun, enjoyable and she makes learning these concepts seem possible for anyone to grasp. She explains different section content very well - always recapping. To get an A or B, do practice problems on MyMathLab.
She is too fast paced. Not approachable!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Professor Sink is GREAT. I normally go to class anyway but for this to be a 8pm class, she made coming worth it. She always explains things to the your full understanding. She is great with understanding everyone's level of math.
Ms. Sink is an awesome teacher!!! Work hard and its an easy A! She funny, smart and cute!!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious

comment: She is a great teacher, just study.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Ms. Sink is the bomb! She goes slow, and will stop to explain something if you don't get it.  I struggle with math, so I went and visited her everyday after class to get help with homework, which saved me from failing.  Awesome, Funny, Smart, AND Pretty!

She is the best teacher I have ever had in my 3 years at KSU.  She is always willing to help you exceed in her class.  The homework can be a pain but its the equivalent to a test grade so it can very easily save your grade.  I would definitely recommend her to anyone.

Sink is hands down the best teacher at KSU. She sets the class up for her students to do well. 3 tests and a final which replaces lowest test grade. Homework for each section but you have 4 attempts. Always includes bonus questions about current events. Love her, If you get the chance take her, she really cares about her students. A is achievable

Super sweet tiny professor. Taught this 3xxx class because unfortunately our professor passed away during the semester. I can honestly say though that professor Sink is one of the best math professors I have ever had. Extremely helpful and clear about how problems should be done. Would recommend to anyone.

This is a very fast paced class and you have to always pay attention. She is very helpful, but you absolutely have to ask before or after class. All classes are mandatory because you will miss important course work. Don't purchase a book. You won't use it.

If you are not a Math person, do not take her.  I repeat  do not take her She goes extremely fast past and if you see her for help, she explains everything very fast so you are still left not understanding how to do the work.   Most people that do well in her class are already great in Math if you have a history of struggling she is not for you.

Mrs. Sink was awesome! I absolutely loved her class. It's a very simple class, no confusion with anything. Her notes and study guides for the tests are exactly like the tests, so no surprises. She is very helpful if you need anything or don't understand something. Easy A!

Professor Sink is the best math teacher I have ever had. She truly cares about how you do in her class. She is absolutely adorable so you are able to stay focused. She posts fill-in-the blank notes and teaches straight from those. If you need help she will make sure you find a time. She has office hours-go to them! I would take her again in a beat!
I was in for trouble when I signed up for calculus but she was the best. Couldn't be any more happy with this professor.. Best math teacher ever!

For starters I suck at Math and I got an A. This isn't to say that the class will be a walk in the park, but if you literally put forth maybe about 30 minutes of studying every-other-day you should be able to easily pass this class. I came to this professor for help and she was always more than willing to help. If you fail, it is YOUR FAULT!

She is an awesome professor. She is very helpful and her tests are easy and based on homework as well. She is funny and cute. She takes the time to answer all of the questions in the class. I have never had trouble with Math, so I didn't specifically need help, but she took the time to help those who did. Take her if you can!
Professor Sink has to be one of the best math professors Kennesaw has! Loved her and got a lot out of the class. She is pretty particular on her tests but gives a lot of partial credit. Take her!

take her take her, she is really easy, you can make an easy A but i didn't put much effort to get an A i got a B, just pay attention and review the study guide before the test, and do all the hw.  she is really cute also ;)
Best math professor ever!Easy A

Best Professor I have ever had. I am normally good at Math so the class what extremely easy for me. Not to mention she is without a doubt the hottest teacher at Kennesaw. I seriously will admit that I think I fell in love each time I went to class. AWESOME!

Very good professor. Took her summer 2014.  Three test drops the lowest. Gives a lot of resources that helps students learn the material, its def not an easy class but she makes it understandable. Many of the questions she puts on d test come from d in class worksheets & the problems she gives us in class .. so NO surprises ! ;) great teacher - A
Very informative; moves quickly through notes. Will help with any questions you have. By far the best math teacher I have ever had.

I took her for Elementary Statistics. She is a very good professor and a very nice person. PRINT OUT all her notes and study them, always do your homework on time and use her study guides she provides and you will do well. Statistics isn't hard especially w/ her help. Just do the work.

Take her if you need another math class to graduate. She is super fun and grades fairly. She is always willing to help you if you feel lost. She does move rather fast through material but YOUR NOTES ARE FILL IN THE BLANK, so its understandable. She gives you so many tools to succeed its impossible to not do well. take her!! you won't be sorry.
If you are not a fast learner do not take her! She goes extremely too fast while teaching lessons. Other then that she is okay.
Absolutely awesome. Keep your notes organized and you will do fine. She is really nice and helpful.

Great professor! Willing to help you out if you make an effort. Open to any question you have. She really cares about her student's success. Will slow down and explain if there is confusion. ATTENDING CLASS IS A MUST! has in class assignments. test review sessions in class.
Great person... Awesome professor

She is the best Calc teacher i have taken so far. 4 tests in the class, she drops the lowest, she gives in class quizzes where you can use your notes, gives study guides that will help during exams, do your homework, and most of all she is funny and beautiful. Anyone taking Math 1106 should take her.

GREAT professor. Definitely does everything she can to help you understand the material. You don't use the textbook any, basically go to class and everything on your test are covered in class. Gives class work occasionally but it just helps with understanding. I would take her for Calc 2 if I could!
Great teacher, very nice and open. She grades fairly. You can get an A in this class. You MUST do your homework and attend class everyday.

Prof. Sink is a very understanding instructor. she gets that if you are taking this class you are a buisness major and you aren't trying to become a math genious. She encourages questions and has helped me via email in a timely manner. She will help you if you're trying. Her class is very structured so you know what to expect on day one!

Great instructor for GenEd math. She is understanding of students who don't excel at math and she is patient with questions no matter how basic.  Very generous with grading but you must turn in all homework for large part of your grade. Lessons move very quickly so be prepared.  Instructor genuinely wants students to succeed.  Highly recommend.

Dr. Sink's teaching style is clear, concise and concrete. When it comes to her students, Dr. Sink has the perfect combination of compassion and detachment.  She is always willing to help and will give a second chance, but she does not let students take advantage of her kindness. Expectations are clearly communicated. She wants everyone to succeed.
Taylor is an awesome teacher.  She explains everything in step by step examples.  She's also very approachable if you have any questions.  I highly recommend her!

Awesome professor!!! TAKE HER! Very clear, gives great, detailed notes, makes sure everyone understands the material, and has a great sense of humor. Do whatever you can to take her! You will pass. 4 tests, the final replaces the lowest test grade. HW online and about 10 in-class worksheets. Do yourself a favor and take this class!

FANTASTIC professor! Always willing to help and explain things to you if you're having trouble. Attendance isn't mandatory, but I suggest going because the course moves quick. Best math teacher I've ever had!

The Homework is helpful but can become overwhelming if you wait to the last moment. The notes help and she conducts a very easy to learn classroom. Make sure your calculator is update and that your efficient with it or you make struggle in this class. Professor Sink was always willing to help me and never made me feel like a burden.

Wonderful teacher. All her class notes are already typed out so you just print them out and bring them to class and fill in the blanks as she goes over the section. Very helpful and gives lots of study guide sheets before tests.
Awesome teacher!! I'm terrible at math and she made everything easier to understand. Don't need the book, she gives notes online to fill out in class.

She goes EXTREMELY fast because she expects you to grasp onto things right off the bat. She gives ONE example per concept and then you have another example for homework. For all the variances that come up under a single concept, it's not enough. She also is pretty bad about explaining connections between concepts, and so it's all rather choppy.
Greatest math teacher I ever had.  So nice and will help you with anything. Class isn't mandatory but you should go so you don't get behind. She is also very approachable and just a great teacher.

Most helpful teacher I ever had. Approachable, accessible, generous with her time. Wants her students to succeed. I loathe this subject and have always struggled with it. Thank heavens I chose her class!

Ms.Sink is not only fun to look at, but also fun to learn from. She is funny and makes sure you know what you need to know for the test...even if you don't like math you will definitely like the view.
She is an awesome teacher! I was worried when I first registered for class, because she was a new teacher, but I'm so glad I was in her class. I definitely recommend!

Ms. Sink is a new teacher causing her to be not as experienced as others. She messes up a lot while teaching. If you miss class, you will be behind even though she has no attendance policy. She also teaches very fast.

This is a well-thought-through opinion. She provides chapter walkthroughs that you must print out online and has tests on each chapter. If you struggle with math, you will get lost when she teaches. USE THE MATH LAB FOR HELP. For those good at math, this will be an easy breeze. She is funny & keeps the class focused. Ask her questions when needed!
Best math teacher I have ever had. She makes the material really easy and makes sure you are prepared for the test.
Miss Sink'is a wonderful professor. Her class is challenging, but she takes the time to explain anything that is confusing. She is an extremely fair grader, and the class is fun (for a math class)!
